attributes.action: Ignore the petition for a General Election and get on with improving the country
attributes.additional_details: The election was fair and the result needs to be accepted by all
attributes.background: Don't divert time or resources to debating the outcome of the recent General Election

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do Not Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703000
